00170 /* 'neighboured' points. first index is pointnum, second index
00171    are the three neighbours */
00172 int nb_pnts[8][3] = { {3, 1, 4}, {0, 2, 5}, {1, 3, 6}, {2, 0, 7},
00173                       {7, 5, 0}, {4, 6, 1}, {5, 7, 2}, {6, 4, 3} };
00174 /* neighboured sides. first index is sidenum, second index are the four
00175    neighbours (the sides sharing one line with the former side). The
00176    second index starts with the line wallpts[first index][0->1] and
00177    ends with the line wallpts[1. index][3->0]. */
00178 int nb_sides[6][4] =
00179 { { 4, 3, 5,
00180     1 },
00181   { 2, 4, 0,
00182     5 }, { 5, 3, 4, 1 }, { 0, 4, 2, 5 }, { 2, 3, 0, 1 }, { 0, 3, 2, 1 } };
